data.title: Amazing food
data.text: We ate our way through the whole downtown area.  We hardly went 10 minutes from when we finished 1 to the next.  The tea salon was just delightful, Francoli served the best pesto, gelato a cafe Luca was so creamy. Tiddlywinks was great all the toys and books that help children develop social skills as well as brain power. Everywhere was just amazing there more but review is getting too ling

data.title: Lots of Food, Lots of Fun!
data.text:
We went on the Sampler tour. We got pasta, an empanada, potato soup, tea, beer, pizza and gelato on this three hour tour around Old Towne. There was plenty of food, and our tour guide, Linda was wonderful.  
There wasn't a lot of walking on this tour. Most of the time was spent sitting and enjoying the delicious food.  I loved that we stayed hydrated. We were given a mini water bottle to start. We got a sample of tea at two locations, water at one and beer at another.
Bringing cash is optional.  One visit offered $5 wine and at the end you are in no way obligated or pressured to tip, but after the great tour you might want to.

data.title: Food and History
data.text: The tour was a lot of fun.  The food was delicious and the history was interesting.  Our guide was knowledgeable, friendly and funny.  There was a lot food so we didn't need to eat lunch afterward.  Overall, we had a great time.  I definitely recommend this tour to both visitors and locals.

data.title: informative
data.text: This is a fun, informative tour that lets you sample some of the local cuisine.  If you're from Orange County, you'll learn some interesting information about the formative years.  Our guide knew a lot about the founders of the city and the county.  The food is pretty good.  Try it, you'll like it. .

data.title: Old Town Orange Walking Food Tour
data.text: Highly Recommend! Guide was awesome, food was wonderful, restaurant owners were great, but most of all the knowledge I learned about the City of Orange was super interesting.

owner_response.author: OTOWFT, Owner at Old Towne Orange Walking Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Glad you had a good time with us,  and hope you come back to visit some of the great restaurants you encountered on the tour!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Tasty Trekking
data.text:
Not only was the food great and the hosts of each eatery wonderful, our guide, Linda, was awesome! The rapport with each establishment and mutual respect was obvious, ensuring everywhere we went we were genuinely
 welcome!  By the time we waddled, stuffed, to the end of our 
trek, my friend and I were making 
plans to return to our favorite places. As locals, it was a great opportunity to try undiscovered gems. Warning: Do NOT eat anything before you go!!!

data.title: Great tour
data.text: Excellent tour! We would definitely do it again. The tour guide was amazing!  Kimberly was nice, knowledgeable and she made it so much fun!

data.title: Old Towne Orange Walking Food Tours
data.text: The food tour was great!  Our tour guide was amazing with all her information and guidance.  She made the tour for our group of 5 a wonderful experience!  I would recommend Old Towne Orange Walking Food Tours!

data.title: Fun + Food = Friends!
data.text: I had so much fun on the Old Towne Orange Food Lab tour!  Our tour guide and all the people in our group were delightful. The food was delicious and abundant -- we all took extra food home with us. This is my second Orange food tour. Don't miss it!

data.title: Fun outing! A must!
data.text: A great way to spend catch up time with freinds, enjoy some new restaurants in a cute old town! This tour is so fun! I will take the. I will take the Christmas tour next.

data.title: Awesome Walking Food Tour
data.text: Renee was a fantastic guide.  We enjoyed all of our great food stops, which were many, varied and most interesting.  We were full, happy and so very glad that we could take our third tour with one of our most favorite food tour companies, Old Towne Orange Walking Food Tours.

data.title: Resisted at first, loved every bit after
data.text: My daughter-in-law gave us this tour as anniversary gift. I was hesitant at first, until my wife convinced me. I loved every bit. Renee, our guide and one of the founders, took care of every little detail, including our food needs (vegetarians). It was a very pleasant day and I wish Renee and her sister continued success. It is a tour worth taking, it encompasses many restaurants and downtown Orange in a few hours.

owner_response.author: OTOWFT, Owner at Old Towne Orange Walking Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: It was a delight having you and your wife on the tour!  So happy to hear your enjoyed your day!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Orange Vintage Food Tour
data.text: Very enjoyable.  Even though we are long term residents and have lived in Orange for 40 years, we still learned something new.

data.title: Such a fun time in Old town Orange
data.text: My mom and aunt picked this as a fun way to celebrate my birthday. We went on the Vintage tour and it exceeded my expectations. Our tour guide was friendly, fun, and informative. I had no idea how quaint the City of Orange is. The food samplings were delicious. I enjoyed all of the interesting shops we visited and the little gifts we received while on the tour. The walking is light and it is an extremely fun way to learn the history of a cute little city.

data.title: Fun day!
data.text: Second food tour we have taken. Got lots of history and good food. Recommend it. Our tour guide was fun and knowledgeable.

data.title: Great food tour!
data.text: After meeting up with our tour guide Linda, who was very informative,  we were off to our 2nd stop. Had wine,  cheese and pasta at an Italian restaurant Froncoli Delicious! !  We finished the day with some yummy Gelato.

data.title: A very pleasant way to explore Old Town Orange
data.text:
Lived in Southern California for 20 years and did not know Orange is so charming ! 
We had a great tour guide, and the restaurants we visited were very welcoming. 
Highly recommend this tour and look forward to returning to Orange soon.

data.title: Old Towne Orange Vintage Food Tour
data.text: This is the third tour I've done with this group, and I think It's the best one!  This tour takes in the Saturday Farmer's Market, among other stops.  Renae was our friendly & informative guide, as well as being one of the owners.  I had two out of town friends that grew up in Orange, so it was FUN to show off the new sights around town.

data.title: Fun Time in Old Towne Orange
data.text: Renee our tour guide was fabulous! It was great learning about the history of Orange and seeing how old historic buildings had been restored or repurposed. Plus I had no idea we would get to eat so much food! I made the mistake of eating a small breakfast before starting out. However, at first stop we were treated to a yummy breakfast of cinnamon french toast & sausage. And the food just kept on coming! It was a great date for my husband & I and I know we'll return to visit.

data.title: A MUST DO
data.text:
Absolutely wonderful way to spend a day plan on going back for the Christmas Tour! Guide was super knowledgeable and very friendly and informative.
Had a blast would recommend for anyone!!!!!!!!
